channel.title: Consistency Monitoring on Never stop learning!
channel.description: Recent content in Consistency Monitoring on Never stop learning!

item.title: Extential Consistency Paper Review
item.description: Existential Consistency: Measuring and Understanding Consistency at Facebook Buzzwords a trade-off between stronger forms of consistency and higher performance properties consistency monitoring system practical consistency monitoring system principle consistency monitoring system Ï†-consistency Facebook’s Replicated Storage Database Two-Level Cache Graph data model Local Consistency Models Linearizability Per-Object Sequential Consistency Read-After-Write Consistency Summary The paper introduces the storage for giant read-heavy sites(such as Facebook’s TAO) and their technique to detect anomalies and monitor consistency.
